oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Relatedness among cryo-bank bulls of the Yakutian Cattle breed as estimated with microsatellite data
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Tapio, I.
Tapio, M.
Li, M.-H.
Popov, R.
Kantanen, J.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Breeding and genetics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We analysed 30 autosomal microsatellites in order to clarify genetic relatedness between these bulls and provide recommendations for the use of their semen in conservation and breed management.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Tapio, I.; Tapio, M.; Li, M.-H.; Popov, R. and Kantanen, J. (2009) Relatedness among cryo-bank bulls of the Yakutian Cattle breed as estimated with microsatellite data. In: Book of abstracts no. 15, p. 126.
